item.title: How to use nginx as caching server?
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll explore the caching functionality of nginx by creating a simple caching server. By following the steps below, you can set up your own environment to cache responses using nginx.

item.title: How to access proxmox disk image file on host?
item.description: Recently I could not connect to my proxmox virtual machine on which I had some important files for my project. In this tutorial I will show how to easily mount a disk from a proxmox virtual machine and access its data.

item.title: Special Parameters in Bash
item.description: Have you ever wondered how to get Process ID of the last background process? Or how to print PID of the current shell? Today, we’ll cover special parameters in Bash that can help you work with scripts more effectively.
